mapper.select: select id, name, status, create_time as createTime, user_id as createUser from FIN_MBOX_TABLET_GROUP
mapper.insert:
SELECT FIN_SEQ_MBOX_TABLET_GROUP.nextval AS id FROM DUAL
insert into FIN_MBOX_TABLET_GROUP (id,name,status,create_time,user_id) values(#{id},#{name},1,sysdate,#{createUser})
mapper.update: update FIN_MBOX_TABLET_GROUP set name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select u.id,u.f_name as userName,u.logon_name as name,u.naming as naming from t_user u,FIN_MBOX_R_GROUP_USER r where u.id=r.USER_ID and r.GROUP_ID = #{groupId}

select t.id as id, t.DEVICE_NUMBER as deviceNumber, t.name as name, t.address as address, t.device_ip as ip, t.link_man as linkMan, t.phone as phone, t.status as status, t.create_time as createTime, o.deal_stauts as dealStatus, o.lock_status as lockStatus, o.lock_user as lockUser, o.client_mac as clientMac, o.lock_time as lockTime, o.line_status as lineStatus from FIN_MBOX_R_GROUP_TABLET r,FIN_MBOX_TABLET t left join FIN_MBOX_TABLET_OPT o on t.id=o.id where r.TABLET_ID = t.id and r.GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
